oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Football team, 1917
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 1917 MTN football team. The names and positions of the players are listed under their photos.

Top row (left to right): William Smith, R. Half; C. Miles, Full; Neely, Half; and R. Smith, Quarterback. Middle row: Butler, R. End; Wood, R. Tackle; Herrin, R. Guard; S. Huddleston, Center; Bomar, L. Guard; Overall, L. Tackle; and Clardy, L. End. Bottom row: Morgan, Manager; Hayes, S. Guard; Joseph T. Smith, S. End; A. Huddleston, S. Center; Wynne, S. Full; Faller, S. Half; and Floyd, Coach.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Football teams; Football players; College sports; Middle Tennessee State Normal School
